traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
entries: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The scion makes one Crystal Club attack and two Slam attacks, then uses Entombing Grasp if available. Alternatively, the scion makes two Runic Boulder attacks.

actions.name: Crystal Club
entries: Melee atk +16 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 35 (4d12 + 9 damage) bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: The scion can cause the club to flare with bright light, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or take 18 (4d8 damage) radiant damage and have the {@condition blinded} condition until the start of the scion's next turn.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 31 (4d10 + 9 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Runic Boulder
entries: Ranged atk +16 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 27 (4d8 + 9 damage) bludgeoning damage. Hit or Miss: The boulder explodes. The target and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 19 (3d12 damage) force damage and has the {@condition prone} condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Entombing Grasp {@recharge}
entries: The scion wreathes its hand in petrifying magic and touches one Huge or smaller creature it can see within 20 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or take 28 (8d6 damage) force damage and have the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 19). At the start of the scion's next turn, if the target is still {@condition grappled}, the target has the {@condition petrified} condition.
